verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לְעֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> [Tle-'e-ved-the servant יְהוָ֬ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David נְאֻֽם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith פֶּ֣שַׁע <WH6588> Pe-sha' The transgression לָ֭רָשָׁע <WH7563> La-ra-sho' of the wicked בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev within לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib-Bi; my heart אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- There פַּ֥חַד <WH6343> Pa-chad [that there is] no fear אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> le-Ne-ged before עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nav. before his eyes

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הֶחֱלִ֣יק <WH2505> he-che-Lik For he flattereth אֵלָ֣יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> be-'ei-Nav; himself in his own eyes לִמְצֹ֖א <WH4672> lim-Tzo be found עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> a-vo-No until his iniquity לִשְׂנֹֽא׃ <WH8130> lis-No. to be hateful

דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> div-rei- The words פִ֭יו <WH6310> fiv of his mouth אָ֣וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven [are] iniquity וּמִרְמָ֑ה <WH4820> u-mir-Mah; and deceit חָדַ֖ל <WH2308> cha-Dal he hath left off לְהַשְׂכִּ֣יל <WH7919> le-has-Kil to be wise לְהֵיטִֽיב׃ <WH3190> le-hei-Tiv. [and] to do good

אָ֤וֶן׀ <WH205> 'A-ven mischief יַחְשֹׁ֗ב <WH2803> yach-Sho, He deviseth עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon מִשְׁכָּ֫ב֥וֹ <WH4904> mish-Ka-Vo upon his bed יִ֭תְיַצֵּב <WH3320> Yit-yatz-tzev he setteth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech himself in a way לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; [that is] not good רָ֝֗ע <WH7451> Ra', not evil לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo does not יִמְאָֽס׃ <WH3988> yim-'As. he abhorreth

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD בְּהַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> be-hash-sha-Ma-yim [is] in the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; Thy mercy אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> 'e-mu-na-te-cha, [and] thy faithfulness עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- to שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> she-cha-Kim. [reacheth] unto the clouds

צִדְקָֽתְךָ֨׀ <WH6666> tzid-ka-te-Cha Thy righteousness כְּֽהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> ke-har-rei- mountains אֵ֗ל <WH410> 'El, [is] like the great מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶךָ <WH4941> Mish-pa-te-cha thy judgments תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> te-Hom deep רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> rab-Bah; [are] a great אָ֤דָֽם־ <WH120> 'A-dam- man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> u-ve-he-Mah and beast תוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> to-Shi-a' thou preservest יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. O LORD

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- How יָּקָ֥ר <WH3368> ya-Kar How excellent חַסְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> chas-de-Cha, [is] thy lovingkindness אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei therefore the children אָדָ֑ם <WH120> 'a-Dam; of men בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> be-Tzel under the shadow כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <WH3671> ke-na-Fei-cha, of thy wings יֶחֱסָיֽוּן׃ <WH2620> ye-che-sa-Yun. put their trust

יִ֭רְוְיֻן <WH7301> Yir-ve-yun They shall be abundantly satisfied מִדֶּ֣שֶׁן <WH1880> mid-De-shen with the fatness בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> bei-Te-cha; of thy house וְנַ֖חַל <WH5158> ve-Na-chal of the river עֲדָנֶ֣יךָ <WH5730> 'a-da-Nei-cha of thy pleasures תַשְׁקֵֽם׃ <WH8248> tash-Kem. and thou shalt make them drink

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עִ֭מְּךָ <WH5973> 'Im-me-cha You מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> me-Kor For with thee [is] the fountain חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> chai-Yim; of life בְּ֝אוֹרְךָ֗ <WH216> be-'or-cha, in thy light נִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> nir-'eh- shall we see אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> or. light

מְשֹׁ֣ךְ <WH4900> me-Shoch O continue חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> Chas-de-cha thy lovingkindness לְיֹדְעֶ֑יךָ <WH3045> le-yo-de-'Ei-cha; unto them that know וְ֝צִדְקָֽתְךָ֗ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-te-cha, thee and thy righteousness לְיִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> le-yish-rei- to the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. in heart

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תְּ֭בוֹאֵנִי <WH935> Te-vo-'e-ni come רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel Let not the foot גַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH1346> ga-'a-Vah; of pride וְיַד־ <WH3027> ve-yad- against me and let not the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תְּנִדֵֽנִי׃ <WH5110> te-ni-De-ni. remove

שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham There נָ֭פְלוּ <WH5307> Na-fe-lu fallen פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei There are the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven; of iniquity דֹּ֝ח֗וּ <WH1760> do-Chu, they are cast down וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not יָ֥כְלוּ <WH3201> Ya-che-lu and shall not be able קֽוּם׃ <WH6965> Kum. to rise
